trans-unit.source: PHP on Windows to SQL DB | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: PHP on Windows to SQL DB | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Presents a sample PHP program that connects to Azure SQL Database from a Windows client with transient fault handling, and provides links to the necessary software components needed by the client.
trans-unit.target: Presents a sample PHP program that connects to Azure SQL Database from a Windows client with transient fault handling, and provides links to the necessary software components needed by the client.

trans-unit.source: Connect to SQL Database by using PHP on Windows with Transient Fault Handling
trans-unit.target: Connect to SQL Database by using PHP on Windows with Transient Fault Handling

trans-unit.source: This topic illustrates how you can connect to Azure SQL Database from a client application written in PHP that runs on Windows.
trans-unit.target: This topic illustrates how you can connect to Azure SQL Database from a client application written in PHP that runs on Windows.

trans-unit.source: Create a database and retrieve your connection string
trans-unit.target: Create a database and retrieve your connection string

trans-unit.source: See the [Getting Started Topic](sql-database-get-started.md) to learn how to create a sample database and retrieve your connection string.
trans-unit.target: See the [Getting Started Topic](sql-database-get-started.md) to learn how to create a sample database and retrieve your connection string.

trans-unit.source: It is important you follow the guide to create an **AdventureWorks database template**.
trans-unit.target: It is important you follow the guide to create an **AdventureWorks database template**.

trans-unit.source: The samples shown below only work with the **AdventureWorks schema**.
trans-unit.target: The samples shown below only work with the **AdventureWorks schema**.

trans-unit.source: Connect and query your database
trans-unit.target: Connect and query your database

trans-unit.source: The demo program is designed so that a transient error during an attempt to connect leads to a retry.
trans-unit.target: The demo program is designed so that a transient error during an attempt to connect leads to a retry.

trans-unit.source: But a transient error during query command causes the program to discard the connection and create a new connection, before retrying the query command.
trans-unit.target: But a transient error during query command causes the program to discard the connection and create a new connection, before retrying the query command.

trans-unit.source: We neither recommend nor disrecommend this design choice.
trans-unit.target: We neither recommend nor disrecommend this design choice.

trans-unit.source: The demo program illustrates some of the design flexibility that is available to you.
trans-unit.target: The demo program illustrates some of the design flexibility that is available to you.

trans-unit.source: The length of this code sample is due mostly to the catch exception logic.
trans-unit.target: The length of this code sample is due mostly to the catch exception logic.

trans-unit.source: A shorter version of this Program.cs file is available this [here](sql-database-develop-php-simple-windows.md).
trans-unit.target: A shorter version of this Program.cs file is available this [here](sql-database-develop-php-simple-windows.md).

trans-unit.source: The Main method is in Program.cs.
trans-unit.target: The Main method is in Program.cs.

trans-unit.source: The callstack runs as follows:
trans-unit.target: The callstack runs as follows:

trans-unit.source: Main calls ConnectAndQuery.
trans-unit.target: Main calls ConnectAndQuery.

trans-unit.source: ConnectAndQuery calls EstablishConnection.
trans-unit.target: ConnectAndQuery calls EstablishConnection.

trans-unit.source: EstablishConnection calls IssueQueryCommand.
trans-unit.target: EstablishConnection calls IssueQueryCommand.

trans-unit.source: The [sqlsrv_query()](http://php.net/manual/en/function.sqlsrv-query.php) function can be used to retrieve a result set from a query against SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: The [sqlsrv_query()](http://php.net/manual/en/function.sqlsrv-query.php) function can be used to retrieve a result set from a query against SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: This function essentially accepts any query and the connection object and returns a result set which can be iterated over with the use of [sqlsrv_fetch_array()](http://php.net/manual/en/function.sqlsrv-fetch-array.php).
trans-unit.target: This function essentially accepts any query and the connection object and returns a result set which can be iterated over with the use of [sqlsrv_fetch_array()](http://php.net/manual/en/function.sqlsrv-fetch-array.php).

trans-unit.source: Further reading
trans-unit.target: Further reading

trans-unit.source: For more information regarding PHP installation and usage, see [Accessing SQL Server Databases with PHP](http://technet.microsoft.com/library/cc793139.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For more information regarding PHP installation and usage, see [Accessing SQL Server Databases with PHP](http://technet.microsoft.com/library/cc793139.aspx).
